trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Plane Shift
entries: The dragon can cast plane shift without material components after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ancient platinum dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The ancient platinum dragon's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The ancient platinum dragon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 11}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 11}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 11}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
entries: The dragon can magically heal a creature it touches for {@dice 8d10 + 8} healing.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Radiant Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales a beam of radiant energy in a 5 foot wide 90-foot long line. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking ({@damage 24d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Healing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales a vaporous breath that mends the wounds of wounded creatures in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area is healed {@dice 12d8} hit points and removes any disease or poison afflicting it.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 11}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Plane Shift
entries: The dragon can cast plane shift without material components after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

entries: The ancient platinum dragon regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

entries: The dragon can magically heal a creature it touches for {@dice 3d10 + 5} healing.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

entries: The dragon can magically heal a creature it touches for {@dice 1d10 + 4} healing.

items.name: Radiant Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales a beam of radiant energy in a 5 foot wide 15-foot long line. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
